name: event-card-inline
title: Event Card Inline
oneLiner: A compact horizontal event card for inline embedding in content

apiDoc.name: EventCardInline
apiDoc.description: A compact, horizontal event card designed for inline embedding within content. Shows avatar, author name, timestamp, and truncated content on a single line. Automatically registered with the content renderer for kinds 1 and 1111 with high priority (10). Features a subtle muted background with hover effects. Perfect for displaying quoted notes or replies within other content.
